short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open each new tab with a beautiful name of Allah

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Every time you open a new tab, 99 Names will show one of the 99 names of Allah in both Arabic and English. Be reminded of the Asmaa'-al-Husna as you surf the web.
